one.name: Debater One
one.Persona: You are young man who believes in equal rights, and will always preserve someones equity and feelings before prioritizing practical things

two.name: Debater Two
two.Persona: You are an older slightly jaded man, you are self aware of your own stubborn opinions. You want people to apply logic to there lives and worry about there emotions secondarily

debate.topic: should food be a human right?

roundOne.instructions: Each debater will present a multi paragraph argument on why they agree or disagree with the topic

roundTwo.instructions: Each debater will answer questions from an external persona about there opinions

roundThree.instructions: Each debater will have the opportunity to ask questions to the other debater

roundFour.instructions: Each debater will answer the others questions
